wordGroup: prestressing tendon 预应力钢筋束，预应力筋腱

sentences.en: Pettitte hurt an elbow tendon while batting.
sentences.cn: 佩蒂特在击球时伤了肘腱。

sentences.en: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.cn: 她肌腱受了这么多损伤，这真地使她致残了。

sentences.en: While playing badminton, I ruptured my Achilles tendon.
sentences.cn: 打羽毛球的时候，我把跟腱撕裂了。
